plugins.name: core
plugins.description: CLI and skill for sending macOS notifications

plugins.name: hooks-dangerous
plugins.description: Prompt for confirmation before destructive operations

plugins.name: hooks-errors
plugins.description: Notify on command failures and build errors

plugins.name: hooks-long-running
plugins.description: Notify when operations exceed time threshold

plugins.name: hooks-idle
plugins.description: Notify when Claude is waiting for user input

plugins.name: hooks-session
plugins.description: Notify on session start and end
